newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-S Minn cattle market light at $68 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-S Minn cattle market light at $68 - USDA.

text.p: Slaughter steers and heifers were not well tested with few sales steady to weak, compared with Tuesday's close, USDA said. Trade was slow, with ight to moderate demand. Seller interest light. Offerings light.
Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 no sales.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1100-1175 lbs few 68.00.
Carcass Basis (weight only) Compared Tuesdays close - Slaughter steers and heifers near steady.

Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1150-1300 lbs few 107.00-108.00 Holstein - (weight only) Select to mostly Choice 2-3 1250-1400 lb few 102.00-103.00. Holstein - (grade and weight) Choice 2-3 1250-1400 lb ld 103.00 Select 2-3 1250-1400 lb 98.00.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1050-1200 lbs few 106.50-108.00.
Wk to Date - 36,000 Week Ago - 15,500 Year Ago - 28,800
